aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Learning. Building. Coding. Improving. Asking AI. Fixing what AI broke. More coding. Drinking mate. Reading docs. And yes, more coding.

items.content: Programming student at National Technological University (UTN) and a self-taught developer. I'm passionate about Fullstack Development, building applications from scratch, and working with modern technologies. I enjoy designing solid architectures and applying good practices to keep projects organized and scalable.

I often build personal projects, from small components to complete apps. Each project is a chance to experiment and explore new ideas. My strength is the Frontend, but I also enjoy working on the Backend by building APIs and understanding how everything connects.

I'm currently diving into integrating Artificial Intelligence into modern applications to add smarter features and automate tasks. I'm always looking to improve, discover new tools, and grow through every project I build.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Thinking of ideas. Turning them into projects. Writing code. Breaking things. Fixing them. Asking AI. Arguing with AI. More code. Reading documentation. Drinking mate. Repeat.
